name: create_database
description:
With this tool, you can create databases on a Postgres server. 
 When you want to make a database, you can use this tool to do so.

name: delete_database
description:
With this tool, you can delet databases on a Postgres server. 
 When you want to delete a database, you can use this tool to do so.

name: create_table
description:
With this tool, you can create tables for a Postgres database. 
 When you want to make a table, you can use this tool to do so.

name: list_databases
description:
With this tool, you can list databases on a Postgres server. 
 When you want to view a list of databases, you can use this tool to do so.

name: execute_query
description:
With this tool, you can execute a SQL query on a specific Postgres database. 
 When you want to perform a query action, you can use this tool to do so.

name: drop_table
description: With this tool, you can delete an existing table from a Postgres database.

name: list_tables
description: With this tool, you can list all tables in a Postgres database.
